thread.section_title: Its4women Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Its4women | www.its4women.ie
thread.title: Gianna Tasha

author: Gianna Tasha
title: Gianna Tasha
text: Trying to cancel my policy cancelled today. I have requested it cancelled since last thursday, uploaded documents to cancel last thursday. The company are sending me emails at 3am threatening to cancel the policy because I haven't uploaded the documents they requested. PLEASE PLEASE PLEASE cancel this policy and stop me incurring further on cover charges. I have done live chat, i have spoken to operators... they have all said 24 hours this 24 hours that. I NEED and email that my policy is cancelled so I can insure my car with a company who actually knows what it is doing, who actually is human, who actually do what they say, and I asm HAPPY to spend 300 euros MORE with this company for the pleasure. The system you have is FAILED and I pity anyone having to deal with it. CANCEL MY POLICY TODAY, stop dragging your heels and sending me emails at 3am.
